attributes.action: Force Insurance Companies to do fairer and more affordable car insurance for all
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to stick up for motorists and force the insurance companies to lower their prices or explore other ways to do so, for instance in other European Countries it’s much more affordable such as Norway, Poland, Germany, Sweden France ext
attributes.background: I personally think and many others think car insurance prices are ridiculous, especially young drivers, it’s outright theft that some people can’t get insured on little tiny engined cars for less then £1.000

rejection.details:
Place a Cap on Motor Insurance Premium Increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918

You may also wish to sign these petitions which we've published: 

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067

Introduce fixed prices for car insurance based on power to weight ratio and age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646793
